subject: Re: [junit] Running JUnit textui from within emacs
msgSnippet: ... For working with Java and Emacs, checkout the JDEE, http://jdee.sunsite.dk/ Before switching to IDEA by JetBrains, I used Emacs. And I was able to do what
messageBody:
On Mar 17, 2004, at 5:39 AM, junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Message: 16
> Date: Tue, 16 Mar 2004 07:42:35 -0000
> From: "Marc Darryl Tan" <xerokill@...>
> Subject: Running JUnit textui from within emacs
>
> Hi,
>
> Has anyone managed to configure emacs so the JUnit textui runs
> within a mini-buffer in java major mode?
>
> I've been trying to get it to run in emacs, but to no avail.
>
>
>
> Marc
>
>
For working with Java and Emacs, checkout the JDEE,
http://jdee.sunsite.dk/

Before switching to IDEA by JetBrains, I used Emacs. And I was able to
do what
you want very easily.
